act.title: Dialogue Reconstruction
act.intro: Put the sentences below in the correct order. (They are jumbled randomly and appear in a different order everytime you attempt the activity)

item.pinyin: Yīsheng, wǒ dùzi téng de lìhai.

item.hanzi: 怎么了？你昨晚吃了什么？
item.pinyin: Zěnme le? Nǐ zuówǎn chī le shénme?

item.hanzi: 昨晚和朋友出去吃饭，可能海鲜吃太多了。
item.pinyin: Zuówǎn hé péngyou chūqù chīfàn, kěnéng hǎixiān chī tài duō le.

item.hanzi: 有可能，我给你开点药片，你先试试。
item.pinyin: Yǒu kěnéng, wō gěi nǐ kāi diǎn yàopiàn, nǐ xiān shìshi.

item.hanzi: 一天一次，一次一片，以后不要一下子吃那么多海鲜。
item.pinyin: Yī tiān yī cì, yī cì yī piàn, yǐhòu bùyào yīxiàzi chī nàme duō hǎixiān.
Hǎo, wǒ zhīdào le, xièxie yīsheng.
